threads.title: Core Functionality Fixes
threads.context: Fixed EPUB extraction, timing engine, UI overhaul
threads.summary: Major session addressing core functionality issues. Fixed EPUB text extraction by properly handling HTMLHtmlElement types. Resolved timing cascade bug that was causing instant reads. Added word length timing adjustments for more natural reading pace. Fixed chapter change index reset issue. Completed UI cosmetic overhaul. Lowered default WPM from 300 to 250 for better readability. Increased punctuation pauses for natural sentence flow.
tasksCompleted: Fixed timing cascade bug causing instant reads

threads.title: Design System & Position Tracking
threads.context: Implement focus-optimized design and position tracking system
threads.summary: Implemented comprehensive focus-optimized design system with Atkinson Hyperlegible font, 3 themes (dark, light, sepia), zen mode for distraction-free reading, and ORP guide. Added position tracking with auto-save every 5 words, sentence navigation ([ and ] keys), context preview when paused, and resume marker for returning readers. Created detailed plan for UI/UX overhaul covering book cards, upload area, header, themes, library features, and mobile infrastructure (PWA + Capacitor).
tasksCompleted: Implemented Atkinson Hyperlegible font for readability
Created 3-theme system (dark, light, sepia) with CSS variables
Added zen mode that fades controls during playback
Built position tracking with auto-save every 5 words
Created ContextPreview component showing current sentence when paused
Built ResumeMarker component for returning readers
tasksCreated: Book cards visual hierarchy (hover effects, progress bars)
